translation.en: -[gunshots] -[crowd exclaims]

translation.en: [in English] Don't be a hero. Stay down! Hey!
translation.vi: [in English] Don't be a hero.Stay down! Hey!

translation.en: -[in English] I said down. -[man 2] Don't shoot.
translation.vi: -[in English] I said down.-[man 2] Don't shoot.

translation.en: -[man 2 exclaims] -[man 1] Move, move. Down.
translation.vi: -[man 2 exclaims]-[man 1] Move, move. Down.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, this is not a bank robbery.
translation.vi: Ladies and gentlemen,this is not a bank robbery.

translation.en: I was born in Mabopane, where running water is a luxury.
translation.vi: I was born in Mabopane,where running water is a luxury.

translation.en: My comrades and I grew up in apartheid South Africa,
translation.vi: My comrades and Igrew up in apartheid South Africa,

translation.en: We joined the liberation movement following the June 16 uprisings,
translation.vi: We joined the liberation movementfollowing the June 16 uprisings,

translation.en: With the majority of our leaders either imprisoned or in exile,
translation.vi: With the majority of our leaderseither imprisoned or in exile,

translation.en: the youth have made it their responsibility
translation.vi: the youth have made ittheir responsibility

translation.en: The white minority regime has left us with only one option.
translation.vi: The white minority regimehas left us with only one option.

translation.en: Our orders from high command were simple.
translation.vi: Our orders fromhigh command were simple.

translation.en: Sabotage strategic key points in the capital,
translation.vi: Sabotage strategickey points in the capital,

translation.en: Comrades, Seahorse supplies oil to the South African Defense Force.
translation.vi: Comrades, Seahorse supplies oilto the South African Defense Force.

translation.en: [Khumalo] We plant the explosives and hit as many fuel tanks as possible.
translation.vi: [Khumalo] We plant the explosivesand hit as many fuel tanks as possible.

translation.en: [Khumalo] There's no need for me to tell you that if we get caught,
translation.vi: [Khumalo] There's no need for meto tell you that if we get caught,

translation.en: The truck driver should be here any minute.
translation.vi: The truck drivershould be here any minute.

translation.en: We get the signal from him and we move. Fast.
translation.vi: We get the signal from himand we move. Fast.

translation.en: -Terra… -Mbali!
translation.vi: -Terra…-Mbali!

translation.en: -[in English] He's late. -He shouldn't be.
translation.vi: -[in English] He's late.-He shouldn't be.

translation.en: Are you sure it's the right location? I mean, mistakes happen, huh?
translation.vi: Are you sure it's the right location?I mean, mistakes happen, huh?

translation.en: These guys have been off the radar for so long,
translation.vi: These guys have beenoff the radar for so long,

translation.en: but instead of fleeing, they come back to the capital,
translation.vi: but instead of fleeing,they come back to the capital,

translation.en: one of the most protected cities in the whole damn country.
translation.vi: one of the most protected citiesin the whole damn country.

translation.en: An explosion at the Rooiwal Power Plant near Pretoria early yesterday morning
translation.vi: An explosion at the Rooiwal Power Plantnear Pretoria early yesterday morning

translation.en: has left thousands of homes without electricity
translation.vi: has left thousands of homeswithout electricity

translation.en: and caused millions of rands worth of damage.
translation.vi: and causedmillions of rands worth of damage.

translation.en: This is the latest in a series of sabotage acts by the terrorists
translation.vi: This is the latest in a seriesof sabotage acts by the terrorists

translation.en: that have rocked large cities across South Africa…
translation.vi: that have rocked large citiesacross South Africa…

translation.en: [radio] …causing speculation that a state of emergency might…
translation.vi: [radio] …causing speculation thata state of emergency might…

translation.en: [radio in English] Anyone with information,
translation.vi: [radio in English]Anyone with information,

translation.en: [radio in English] …in Pretoria on 012-555-2670.
translation.vi: [radio in English]…in Pretoria on 012-555-2670.

translation.en: Move back! He is coming towards you. Move back!
translation.vi: Move back!He is coming towards you. Move back!

translation.en: -[Khumalo] Get back inside. Let's go! -That's our guy!
translation.vi: -[Khumalo] Get back inside. Let's go!-That's our guy!

translation.en: -That's not him. That's not our driver. -[Terra] What?
translation.vi: -That's not him. That's not our driver.-[Terra] What?

translation.en: -[man 2] Who is he? -I don't know. Something's wrong.
translation.vi: -[man 2] Who is he?-I don't know. Something's wrong.

translation.en: -Something's not right. -I feel it.
translation.vi: -Something's not right.-I feel it.

translation.en: [in English] Baker. I think he's gonna bolt.
translation.vi: [in English] Baker.I think he's gonna bolt.

translation.vi: -[man 2] Move!-All units move in.

translation.vi: -Masego!-[Khumalo] Get the guns!

translation.vi: -Masego! Masego, move!-[all] Go!

translation.vi: -[Khumalo] Move! Come on, go!-[Terra] Masego!

translation.vi: -Move.-[Terra] Faster, man.

translation.en: Masego, can't this thing go faster? Move, man!

translation.vi: [Khumalo, in Zulu]Piss off! I'll kill you!

translation.vi: Get this thing out of here!Come on! Get it out!

translation.vi: -[in Zulu] Let's go!-[in English] Trying to kill us. Move!

translation.vi: -[in English] Drive, Masego!-[Terra] Go!

translation.vi: [in Zulu] Comrades, get moving.We need to find a way out.

translation.vi: [Terra] Masego! Wake up!What do you think you're doing?

translation.vi: -Terra, we have to leave.-[in Zulu] Go. Quickly, go.

translation.vi: [in English] Terra… Mbali.We need to go. Mbali!

translation.vi: -[Langerman, in English] It's clear.-[man] He's still breathing.

translation.vi: -[in English] Move.-Move! Move!

translation.en: [Terra, in Zulu] What kind of shit is this?
translation.vi: [Terra, in Zulu]What kind of shit is this?

translation.en: -[in English] This is bad. -Calm down.
translation.vi: -[in English] This is bad.-Calm down.

translation.en: -[man pops tongue] -Could you stop that?
translation.vi: -[man pops tongue]-Could you stop that?

translation.en: By the way, you are definitely in the wrong line.
translation.vi: By the way,you are definitely in the wrong line.

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] What you think you're doing, boy?
translation.vi: [in Afrikaans] What you thinkyou're doing, boy?

translation.en: [in English] Excuse me? Um, who you calling a boy?
translation.vi: [in English] Excuse me?Um, who you calling a boy?

translation.en: Don't play dumb with me. You're in the wrong line.
translation.vi: Don't play dumb with me.You're in the wrong line.

translation.en: He's the American citizen that phoned in yesterday.
translation.vi: He's the American citizenthat phoned in yesterday.

translation.en: Captain, they're already shooting at the hostages.
translation.vi: Captain, they're alreadyshooting at the hostages.

translation.en: -Down! -[Johan] Don't shoot.
translation.vi: -Down!-[Johan] Don't shoot.

translation.vi: -[Khumalo] Move. Hey.-[Johan grunts]

translation.en: -[Aldo, in English] Move! -Okay, okay.
translation.vi: -[Aldo, in English] Move!-Okay, okay.

translation.en: Okay. Please don't shoot me. I have a two-year-old daughter.
translation.vi: Okay. Please don't shoot me.I have a two-year-old daughter.

translation.en: And if you want to see her again, don't try any tricks.
translation.vi: And if you want to see her again,don't try any tricks.

translation.en: -Okay. Sorry. -[Aldo] Move.
translation.vi: -Okay. Sorry.-[Aldo] Move.

translation.vi: -Get up!-[hostages cry out]

translation.en: Money's in the vault. Just don't hurt anyone.
translation.vi: Money's in the vault.Just don't hurt anyone.

translation.vi: -Okay.-[Khumalo] Now.

translation.en: [woman] I could show you where the vault is.
translation.vi: [woman] I could show youwhere the vault is.

translation.en: -Move! -[nervously] Okay. Okay, okay.
translation.vi: -Move!-[nervously] Okay. Okay, okay.

translation.vi: [Khumalo, in Zulu] What's this? Hello.

translation.en: -It's filthy. -[Terra mocks]

translation.en: [in Zulu] Ladies too. [in English] Let's go!
translation.vi: [in Zulu] Ladies too.[in English] Let's go!

translation.en: I'm not moving. I'm not going anywhere. Whatever…
translation.vi: I'm not moving.I'm not going anywhere. Whatever…

translation.en: -[Langerman] Who's she? -[Schoeman] Name's Jane.
translation.vi: -[Langerman] Who's she?-[Schoeman] Name's Jane.

translation.en: She claims to be related to the bank supervisor.
translation.vi: She claims to be relatedto the bank supervisor.

translation.en: A woman, white, by the name of Christine. She says she can help.
translation.vi: A woman, white, by the name of Christine.She says she can help.

translation.en: -What do you think? -I'm not moving…
translation.vi: -What do you think?-I'm not moving…

translation.en: Let's keep her close. We might need her later.
translation.vi: Let's keep her close.We might need her later.

translation.en: [Aldo] Someone in high command sold us out.
translation.vi: [Aldo] Someone in high commandsold us out.

translation.en: -[screams] -[glass shatters]
translation.vi: -[screams]-[glass shatters]

translation.en: Calvin Khumalo, Aldo Erasmus, Mbali Terra Mabunda.
translation.vi: Calvin Khumalo,Aldo Erasmus, Mbali Terra Mabunda.

translation.en: Never mind our names. How did he know about the mission?
translation.vi: Never mind our names.How did he know about the mission?

translation.en: [in English] Surrender your weapons and come out with your hands above your head.
translation.vi: [in English] Surrender your weapons andcome out with your hands above your head.

translation.en: -[in Zulu] Maybe the truck driver? -No. All the truck driver knew
translation.vi: -[in Zulu] Maybe the truck driver?-No. All the truck driver knew

translation.en: was to meet us there and drive us in. That's it.
translation.vi: was to meet us thereand drive us in. That's it.

translation.en: [Langerman] I repeat, Calvin, we have the building surrounded.
translation.vi: [Langerman] I repeat, Calvin,we have the building surrounded.

translation.en: There were other units on the Seahorse mission.
translation.vi: There were other unitson the Seahorse mission.

translation.en: [Langerman, in English] Come out with your hands above your head.
translation.vi: [Langerman, in English] Come outwith your hands above your head.

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] I'm Captain Langerman. South African Police.
translation.vi: [in Afrikaans] I'm Captain Langerman.South African Police.

translation.en: [in English] English.
translation.vi: [in English] English.

translation.en: You don't speak Afrikaans, yet you call yourself a South African?
translation.vi: You don't speak Afrikaans,yet you call yourself a South African?

translation.en: and you haven't bothered to learn an indigenous language,
translation.vi: and you haven't botheredto learn an indigenous language,

translation.en: you're spitting in the face of the Afrikaner nation.
translation.vi: you're spitting in the faceof the Afrikaner nation.

translation.en: I don't give a damn about the Afrikaner nation.
translation.vi: I don't give a damnabout the Afrikaner nation.

translation.en: They've taken apart my family, and they've taken apart many more.
translation.vi: They've taken apart my family,and they've taken apart many more.

translation.en: My point is that it is going to be up to you and me to resolve this.
translation.vi: My point is that it is goingto be up to you and me to resolve this.

translation.en: Me and my comrades are going to walk out of here safely.
translation.vi: Me and my comradesare going to walk out of here safely.

translation.en: Unless you want us to start throwing bodies out the door.
translation.vi: Unless you want us to startthrowing bodies out the door.

translation.en: And I want safe passage to a location of our choosing,
translation.vi: And I want safe passageto a location of our choosing,

translation.en: which I will tell the pilot once we're airborne, no tricks.
translation.vi: which I will tell the pilotonce we're airborne, no tricks.

translation.en: But better it gets messy out here than in the bank.
translation.vi: But better it gets messyout here than in the bank.

translation.en: Get me the helicopter. Let's get them outside.
translation.vi: Get me the helicopter.Let's get them outside.

translation.en: [Khumalo] After this, you'll be holding your newborn baby in your arms.
translation.vi: [Khumalo] After this, you'll be holdingyour newborn baby in your arms.

translation.en: -And Terra hasn't killed anyone yet. So… -[Aldo laughs]
translation.vi: -And Terra hasn't killed anyone yet. So…-[Aldo laughs]

translation.en: We would like to thank you for your kind cooperation.
translation.vi: We would like to thank youfor your kind cooperation.

translation.en: We did not intend to be here. But here we are.
translation.vi: We did not intend to be here.But here we are.

translation.en: Unfortunately, for me and my comrades to depart,
translation.vi: Unfortunately, for meand my comrades to depart,

translation.en: Man, I'm Black, just like you. I ain't got nothing to do with this.
translation.vi: Man, I'm Black, just like you.I ain't got nothing to do with this.

translation.en: -How long you been in the police force? -I'm not.
translation.vi: -How long you been in the police force?-I'm not.

translation.en: [in English] Targets are now entering the helicopter.
translation.vi: [in English]Targets are now entering the helicopter.

translation.en: Aldo, man. You have to trust me. Come, let's move!
translation.vi: Aldo, man. You have to trust me.Come, let's move!

translation.en: -This is too easy. -Move.
translation.vi: -This is too easy.-Move.

translation.en: [in English] Hostage breaking away. Do not fire. I repeat, do not fire.
translation.vi: [in English] Hostage breaking away.Do not fire. I repeat, do not fire.

translation.en: -[Langerman] Do not fire. -[Terra] Get up!
translation.vi: -[Langerman] Do not fire.-[Terra] Get up!

translation.en: [Khumalo, in Zulu] Come out of there, you dog. Come out!
translation.vi: [Khumalo, in Zulu] Come out of there,you dog. Come out!

translation.en: The hostage in the white shirt is not American. He's a Boer.
translation.vi: The hostage in the white shirtis not American. He's a Boer.

translation.en: -[Johan, in Afrikaans] Shoot! -[Langerman, in English] Do not fire.
translation.vi: -[Johan, in Afrikaans] Shoot!-[Langerman, in English] Do not fire.

translation.en: -[Langerman] What happened? -[Khumalo] You know!
translation.vi: -[Langerman] What happened?-[Khumalo] You know!

translation.en: -[Khumalo] Move. -[Terra] Get back!
translation.vi: -[Khumalo] Move.-[Terra] Get back!

translation.en: -You are alone now. -[moaning] No.
translation.vi: -You are alone now.-[moaning] No.

translation.en: -[Schoeman] No! -Schoeman?
translation.vi: -[Schoeman] No!-Schoeman?

translation.en: [in English] Huh? Triple seven. A Black white supremacist.
translation.vi: [in English] Huh? Triple seven.A Black white supremacist.

translation.en: [Aldo] I knew they weren't gonna let us fly away.
translation.vi: [Aldo] I knewthey weren't gonna let us fly away.

translation.en: -You selfish piece of shit! -Go to hell, Terra!
translation.vi: -You selfish piece of shit!-Go to hell, Terra!

translation.en: [Terra] You'll go to hell! I'll show you hell.
translation.vi: [Terra] You'll go to hell!I'll show you hell.

translation.en: [in English] We'd be dead if it wasn't for him, okay?
translation.vi: [in English] We'd be deadif it wasn't for him, okay?

translation.en: -[pilot, in English] Okay. -[Terra, in Zulu] Let's go.
translation.vi: -[pilot, in English] Okay.-[Terra, in Zulu] Let's go.

translation.en: But you're nothing but a bunch of terrorists.
translation.vi: But you're nothingbut a bunch of terrorists.

translation.en: [in English] Busy working for the white man? Get up, boy!
translation.vi: [in English] Busy workingfor the white man? Get up, boy!

translation.en: On your bloody knees. On your bloody knees. Shit!
translation.vi: On your bloody knees.On your bloody knees. Shit!

translation.en: -Who is the bloody informer? -[pilot] I don't--
translation.vi: -Who is the bloody informer?-[pilot] I don't--

translation.en: -[pilot gasping] -[in Zulu] Talk!
translation.vi: -[pilot gasping]-[in Zulu] Talk!

translation.en: -I don't know. -[Terra] Lies!
translation.vi: -I don't know.-[Terra] Lies!

translation.en: [in English] I don't know. I'm just a pilot.
translation.vi: [in English] I don't know.I'm just a pilot.

translation.en: Because of people like him, Masego is dead.
translation.vi: Because of people like him,Masego is dead.

translation.en: [in English] The police knew about the Seahorse Oil mission
translation.vi: [in English] The police knew aboutthe Seahorse Oil mission

translation.en: See, the way I see it, you have two options.
translation.vi: See, the way I see it,you have two options.

translation.en: They put the gun in the helicopter so I could take you out
translation.vi: They put the gun in the helicopterso I could take you out

translation.en: There's only one of two ways you're leaving this bank.
translation.vi: There's only one of two waysyou're leaving this bank.

translation.en: Just when you think your day couldn't get any worse.
translation.vi: Just when you thinkyour day couldn't get any worse.

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] The Little Crocodile is here.
translation.vi: [in Afrikaans]The Little Crocodile is here.

translation.en: -[dogs barking] -[radio chatter]
translation.vi: -[dogs barking]-[radio chatter]

translation.en: [man, in English] Units are taking over operational command.
translation.vi: [man, in English]Units are taking over operational command.

translation.en: The Big Crocodile is dying to see you. And he's on the warpath.
translation.vi: The Big Crocodile is dying to see you.And he's on the warpath.

translation.en: -Brigadier, we've been on this case-- -[Brigadier] I'm not talking to you.
translation.vi: -Brigadier, we've been on this case---[Brigadier] I'm not talking to you.

translation.en: But why is it standing there? In front of Uncle Paul?
translation.vi: But why is it standing there?In front of Uncle Paul?

translation.en: The Justice Minister's daughter, Christine, is one of the hostages.
translation.vi: The Justice Minister's daughter,Christine, is one of the hostages.

translation.en: With all the horses, the dogs, the guns, the soldiers, and everything.
translation.vi: With all the horses, the dogs,the guns, the soldiers, and everything.

translation.en: You know that big fight with John Tate and Gerrie Coetzee, huh?
translation.vi: You know that big fight withJohn Tate and Gerrie Coetzee, huh?

translation.en: Well, how about Nelson Mandela? You know Mandela, right?
translation.vi: Well, how about Nelson Mandela?You know Mandela, right?

translation.en: -Hey! -[Cornelius] Whoa, easy.
translation.vi: -Hey!-[Cornelius] Whoa, easy.

translation.en: and they need to relieve themselves, please.
translation.vi: and they needto relieve themselves, please.

translation.en: -[in English] They're won't let us out. -I'm not surrendering.
translation.vi: -[in English] They're won't let us out.-I'm not surrendering.

translation.en: They've been trying to kill us since the depot.
translation.vi: They've been tryingto kill us since the depot.

translation.en: I know I've never let you guys down before, but…
translation.vi: I know I've never letyou guys down before, but…

translation.en: if our lives are worth nothing, then maybe…
translation.vi: if our lives are worth nothing,then maybe…

translation.en: Maybe we negotiate for a life that is worth everything.
translation.vi: Maybe we negotiate fora life that is worth everything.

translation.en: This is the prime minister. He doesn't negotiate.
translation.vi: This is the prime minister.He doesn't negotiate.

translation.en: [Terra, in Zulu] Khumalo. You're starting again.
translation.vi: [Terra, in Zulu] Khumalo.You're starting again.

translation.en: A movement? We need permission from high command.
translation.vi: A movement?We need permission from high command.

translation.en: I told you if you didn't comply with my demands,
translation.vi: I told youif you didn't comply with my demands,

translation.en: What are you talking about? I complied, I delivered your helicopter.
translation.vi: What are you talking about?I complied, I delivered your helicopter.

translation.en: Hey, that wasn't a helicopter, that was a setup.
translation.vi: Hey, that wasn't a helicopter,that was a setup.

translation.en: We want the immediate release of Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela.
translation.vi: We want the immediate releaseof Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela.

translation.en: -[dramatic sting] -[Khumalo] All charges dropped.
translation.vi: -[dramatic sting]-[Khumalo] All charges dropped.

translation.en: We want a presidential pardon from the prime minister,
translation.vi: We want a presidential pardonfrom the prime minister,

translation.en: You have one hour to get me a signed copy of that presidential pardon.
translation.vi: You have one hour to get mea signed copy of that presidential pardon.

translation.en: Then an hour after that, we want him released in full public view.
translation.vi: Then an hour after that,we want him released in full public view.

translation.en: [Khumalo, in Zulu] Let's not give them any other way.
translation.vi: [Khumalo, in Zulu] Let's not give themany other way.

translation.en: [in English] This is gonna need some serious motivation.
translation.vi: [in English] This is gonna needsome serious motivation.

translation.en: [in English] …to keep all of us, no matter what side, safe
translation.vi: [in English] …to keep all of us,no matter what side, safe

translation.en: So that Ernie can celebrate his daughter Karmen's second birthday.
translation.vi: So that Ernie can celebratehis daughter Karmen's second birthday.

translation.en: For thine is the kingdom, the power, and the glory. Amen.
translation.vi: For thine is the kingdom,the power, and the glory. Amen.

translation.en: This is inhumane. You can't just keep us here all day.
translation.vi: This is inhumane.You can't just keep us here all day.

translation.en: Let me hear you say "darkie" one more time.
translation.vi: Let me hear you say"darkie" one more time.

translation.vi: ♪ Money, money ♪

translation.en: Calvin, you know we're considering everything,
translation.vi: Calvin, you knowwe're considering everything,

translation.en: The release of a man like Mandela isn't done at the snap of a finger.
translation.vi: The release of a man like Mandelaisn't done at the snap of a finger.

translation.vi: -Man…-[Khumalo] Take this trolley.

translation.vi: [SWAT leader] Brigadier,they're coming out. The door's opening.

translation.en: [in English] Hold your fire. Hold your fire.
translation.vi: [in English] Hold your fire.Hold your fire.

translation.en: They're coming outside. This is progress.
translation.vi: They're coming outside.This is progress.

translation.en: -[Brigadier, in Afrikaans] Take them now. -No, wait, Brigadier,
translation.vi: -[Brigadier, in Afrikaans] Take them now.-No, wait, Brigadier,

translation.en: [Langerman] No, one of those three isn't one of our suspects.
translation.vi: [Langerman] No, one of those threeisn't one of our suspects.

translation.en: I didn't say he's one of our suspects. I gave you an order.
translation.vi: I didn't say he's one of our suspects.I gave you an order.

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] He wouldn't just expose himself like that.
translation.vi: [in Afrikaans]He wouldn't just expose himself like that.

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] Now you listen to me, Captain.
translation.vi: [in Afrikaans] Now you listen to me,Captain.

translation.en: [in English] Brigadier, permission to engage?
translation.vi: [in English] Brigadier,permission to engage?

translation.en: -Langerman… -[Langerman] Let me talk to him.
translation.vi: -Langerman…-[Langerman] Let me talk to him.

translation.en: -What does it prove? -Light it.
translation.vi: -What does it prove?-Light it.

translation.en: -Hold on. Look-- -Light it!
translation.vi: -Hold on. Look---Light it!

translation.en: I don't want no trouble. This has nothing to do with me.
translation.vi: I don't want no trouble.This has nothing to do with me.

translation.en: -I ain't even from here. -You're home now, brother.
translation.vi: -I ain't even from here.-You're home now, brother.

translation.en: That's right. I'm an American. I'm a boxing promoter.
translation.vi: That's right. I'm an American.I'm a boxing promoter.

translation.en: I shouldn't even be here. Please, take me with you.
translation.vi: I shouldn't even be here.Please, take me with you.

translation.en: -Brigadier, I got the shot. -No!
translation.vi: -Brigadier, I got the shot.-No!

translation.en: [Langerman] Nobody is shooting anything. We're still negotiating.
translation.vi: [Langerman] Nobody is shooting anything.We're still negotiating.

translation.en: -[crowd] Free Nelson Mandela, free him! -[Khumalo] Free Nelson Mandela!
translation.vi: -[crowd] Free Nelson Mandela, free him!-[Khumalo] Free Nelson Mandela!

translation.en: Maybe you don't understand what I'm talking about.
translation.vi: Maybe you don't understandwhat I'm talking about.

translation.en: The next thing I wanna hear from you is that you received that pardon.
translation.vi: The next thing I wanna hear from youis that you received that pardon.

translation.en: If you don't, I'm burning more money and more money.
translation.vi: If you don't, I'm burningmore money and more money.

translation.en: [all in Zulu] Power to the people! Power to the people!
translation.vi: [all in Zulu] Power to the people!Power to the people!

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] You nearly caused an international incident.
translation.vi: [in Afrikaans] You nearly causedan international incident.

translation.en: Get rid of this damn disturbance. I do not want to hear them!
translation.vi: Get rid of this damn disturbance.I do not want to hear them!

translation.en: [crowd cheers in Zulu] Power to the people!
translation.vi: [crowd cheers in Zulu]Power to the people!

translation.en: And I ain't gonna be the one to pay for it.
translation.vi: And I ain't gonna bethe one to pay for it.

translation.en: As long as one of us is in chains, none of us are free.
translation.vi: As long as one of us is in chains,none of us are free.

translation.en: [in Zulu] That bloody captain is a piece of shit.
translation.vi: [in Zulu] That bloody captainis a piece of shit.

translation.en: [in English] I don't care what Khumalo says,
translation.vi: [in English]I don't care what Khumalo says,

translation.en: Captain Langerman will get what he deserves.
translation.vi: Captain Langermanwill get what he deserves.

translation.en: [in English] I'm bleeding. I need the bathroom, please.
translation.vi: [in English] I'm bleeding.I need the bathroom, please.

translation.en: [in Zulu] Erasmus, please deal with this dog before I kill him.
translation.vi: [in Zulu] Erasmus, pleasedeal with this dog before I kill him.

translation.en: -[in English] Get up. -[Christine] What happened?
translation.vi: -[in English] Get up.-[Christine] What happened?

translation.en: -And they made me burn the money. -What?
translation.vi: -And they made me burn the money.-What?

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] Christine, you mad? What do you think you're doing?
translation.vi: [in Afrikaans] Christine, you mad?What do you think you're doing?

translation.en: [in English] You're not in this alone, Miss Fancy Pants. Coming with you.
translation.vi: [in English] You're not in this alone,Miss Fancy Pants. Coming with you.

translation.en: -We need to talk to you. -About what?
translation.vi: -We need to talk to you.-About what?

translation.en: We've asked for food and water. We haven't received any.
translation.vi: We've asked for food and water.We haven't received any.

translation.en: You know, from the moment you walked into this bank,
translation.vi: You know, from the momentyou walked into this bank,

translation.en: you messed up everyone's life, including your own.
translation.vi: you messed up everyone's life,including your own.

translation.en: I'm not the reason you're standing in a line you shouldn't be.
translation.vi: I'm not the reason you're standingin a line you shouldn't be.

translation.en: -Doesn't matter what line I stand in. -[Khumalo] It shouldn't.
translation.vi: -Doesn't matter what line I stand in.-[Khumalo] It shouldn't.

translation.en: But we live in a country where it does for people like us.
translation.vi: But we live in a countrywhere it does for people like us.

translation.en: I think we're more alike than you'd like to admit.
translation.vi: I think we're more alikethan you'd like to admit.

translation.en: You think you're special, different from the rest.
translation.vi: You think you're special,different from the rest.

translation.en: Maybe you're right. But that still doesn't change the fact
translation.vi: Maybe you're right.But that still doesn't change the fact

translation.en: that what you're trying to do here is impossible.
translation.vi: that what you're tryingto do here is impossible.

translation.en: "It always seems impossible until it's done."
translation.vi: "It always seems impossibleuntil it's done."

translation.en: That's a wise man and those are beautiful words.
translation.vi: That's a wise manand those are beautiful words.

translation.en: The police consider Mandela to be the highest form of terrorist.
translation.vi: The police consider Mandelato be the highest form of terrorist.

translation.en: Burn all the money you want, they won't release him.
translation.vi: Burn all the money you want,they won't release him.

translation.en: I don't have to explain myself to any of you.
translation.vi: I don't have to explain myselfto any of you.

translation.en: And that wise man, that wise man who said that,
translation.vi: And that wise man,that wise man who said that,

translation.en: [pilot] You know, it's only a matter of time before the police come in here.
translation.vi: [pilot] You know, it's only a matterof time before the police come in here.

translation.en: When they do, they'll kill you and everyone else in here.
translation.vi: When they do, they'll killyou and everyone else in here.

translation.en: [Aldo] Hey, tell someone who gives a shit, okay?
translation.vi: [Aldo] Hey, tell someonewho gives a shit, okay?

translation.en: I ought to kill you myself if we don't start moving.
translation.vi: I ought to kill you myselfif we don't start moving.

translation.en: [in English] The minute you start releasing hostages…
translation.vi: [in English] The minute youstart releasing hostages…

translation.en: I'll tell your friends who the real informant is.
translation.vi: I'll tell your friendswho the real informant is.

translation.en: -[squelch] -[pilot grunts]
translation.vi: -[squelch]-[pilot grunts]

translation.en: I can do that for you, but I need a favor in return.
translation.vi: I can do that for you,but I need a favor in return.

translation.en: The bank just wants their female supervisor out of there safely.
translation.vi: The bank just wants their femalesupervisor out of there safely.

translation.en: So, the police asked me to release you specifically, Christine.
translation.vi: So, the police asked meto release you specifically, Christine.

translation.en: [in English] If she doesn't want to go, I'll take her place. Pass me my bag.
translation.vi: [in English] If she doesn't want to go,I'll take her place. Pass me my bag.

translation.en: Christine, I suggest you go before I change my mind.
translation.vi: Christine, I suggest you gobefore I change my mind.

translation.en: I'm not going to leave these people here.
translation.vi: I'm not goingto leave these people here.

translation.en: They're my responsibility. I can't just abandon them.
translation.vi: They're my responsibility.I can't just abandon them.

translation.en: -[in Afrikaans] Doesn't wanna come out. -[in English] Why not?
translation.vi: -[in Afrikaans] Doesn't wanna come out.-[in English] Why not?

translation.vi: How am I supposed to know?Maybe she likes the ambiance in there.

translation.vi: I gave you two hostages, okay.We need that letter, Captain.

translation.vi: Captain. What if we usethat old lady over there?

translation.en: We could use her to persuade Christine to come out of the bank.
translation.vi: We could use her to persuadeChristine to come out of the bank.

translation.en: How desperate do you want us to look? Hmm?
translation.vi: How desperate do you want us to look? Hmm?

translation.vi: You had every opportunity to go,but you didn't take it.

translation.vi: What's stopping mefrom killing you right now?

translation.vi: -Probably had white parents.-[exhales]

translation.en: White friends, spoke English your whole life.
translation.vi: White friends,spoke English your whole life.

translation.en: Maybe get away with it because of how you look.
translation.vi: Maybe get away with itbecause of how you look.

translation.en: But you can't run away from who you really are.
translation.vi: But you can't runaway from who you really are.

translation.en: -You don't know me! -[dramatic sting]
translation.vi: -You don't know me!-[dramatic sting]

translation.en: You think it's easy being me, looking the way that I do?
translation.vi: You think it's easy being me,looking the way that I do?

translation.en: People constantly sniggering and debating who I am.
translation.vi: People constantly sniggeringand debating who I am.

translation.en: And you know nothing about the choices I've had to make.
translation.vi: And you know nothingabout the choices I've had to make.

translation.en: You know, all day I've been thinking who the informant could be.
translation.vi: You know, all day I've been thinkingwho the informant could be.

translation.en: You can put the gun to my head if that'll help.
translation.vi: You can put the gunto my head if that'll help.

translation.en: What you've asked for is not easy to deliver.
translation.vi: What you've asked foris not easy to deliver.

translation.en: -And you know it. -Maybe you don't understand!
translation.vi: -And you know it.-Maybe you don't understand!

translation.vi: You know what?I think I'm done burning money.

translation.en: Maybe I should burn this building, this square,
translation.vi: Maybe I should burn this building,this square,

translation.en: I will burn this whole country down if it takes it.
translation.vi: I will burnthis whole country down if it takes it.

translation.en: Why don't you give them what they want? Let sanity prevail!
translation.vi: Why don't you give them what they want?Let sanity prevail!

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] Pastor. [in English] I'm doing my best.
translation.vi: [in Afrikaans] Pastor.[in English] I'm doing my best.

translation.en: In order for this to work, I need Calvin to help me.
translation.vi: In order for this to work,I need Calvin to help me.

translation.en: You are not a partner. You're not helping me.
translation.vi: You are not a partner.You're not helping me.

translation.en: -Ha! -[Schoeman] Captain!
translation.vi: -Ha!-[Schoeman] Captain!

translation.vi: -Letter from the prime minister.-Calvin, wait!

translation.vi: -Wait!-[Schoeman] Captain!

translation.en: It's a pardon and a statement of release.

translation.vi: Okay, well…when are you actually releasing him?

translation.vi: I need to come insideand make sure that all hostages are okay.

translation.en: -[scoffs] -Then they'll release him.
translation.vi: -[scoffs]-Then they'll release him.

translation.vi: [Terra]Khumalo, what does he want in here?

translation.en: [in English] We're gonna release Mandela, Terra. It's okay.
translation.vi: [in English] We're gonna release Mandela,Terra. It's okay.

translation.en: You get my name out of your mouth. Hear me?
translation.vi: You get my name out of your mouth.Hear me?

translation.vi: I've been askedto make sure everybody's okay.

translation.en: We're working to get you out of here, okay?
translation.vi: We're workingto get you out of here, okay?

translation.en: [in Afrikaans] People outside are worried about you.
translation.vi: [in Afrikaans] People outsideare worried about you.

translation.vi: It seems she feels saferin here than out there, Captain.

translation.en: And I think you've seen everything you need to see.
translation.vi: And I think you've seeneverything you need to see.

translation.vi: The pilot,Sechaba Maselemola, where is he?

translation.vi: Know what, Captain?I think you've overstayed your welcome.

translation.vi: -[Langerman] Yes.-[Khumalo] Does it?

translation.vi: -[Khumalo] For your sake! It better.-Please. Please.
